abstract: Yuri L Grabovsky, Ukrainian lawyer defending Aleksandr A Aleksandrov, Russian official on trial in Ukraine for covert military activity there, is found dead from gunshot wound.
lead_paragraph: Yuri L. Grabovsky had been representing a serviceman detained last year and suspected by Ukrainian officials of being in eastern Ukraine on a military mission.

headline.main: Lawyer Defending Russian Soldier in Ukraine Is Found Dead
headline.print_headline: Ukrainian Lawyer Defending Russian Soldier Is Found Dead

snippet: Yuri L. Grabovsky had been representing a serviceman detained last year and suspected by Ukrainian officials of being in eastern Ukraine on a military mission.
